items.title: Up to 67% off Rainbow Six Siege for our Travel Sale!
items.abstract: Play in new worlds & take in the sights
items.content:
[All aboard the Travel Sale express! Save up to 80% off our games and prepare for a fun-filled getaway.](https://store.ubi.com/us/special-offers/?lang=en_US)

Team up with your friends and engage in intense 5v5 combat with [Rainbow Six Siege](https://store.ubi.com/us/game/?&pid=56c494ad88a7e300458b4d5a&dwvar_56c494ad88a7e300458b4d5a_Platform=pcdl&edition=The%20Game&source=detail) at up to 67% off. You can also save on the Ultimate Edition and unlock the latest operators.

The Ultimate Edition includes:
- Year 1-4 Passes
- Year 5 Pass which includes VIP member perks, 6 new Operators and customization content!

Save on this game and more during our Travel Sale today!

[SHOP NOW](https://store.ubi.com/us/game/?&pid=56c494ad88a7e300458b4d5a&dwvar_56c494ad88a7e300458b4d5a_Platform=pcdl&edition=The%20Game&source=detail)

Valid on select titles. Offer ends August 4, 2021.
